body_html: @Carmezim Thank you. I was trying with the various PHP environments on my windows machine, which has php 2.7 and 3.6. Since it was not working with 3.6, out of desperation, I tried with 2.7 and copied that message and not the one with 3.6 (which produces the same error message). I notice now that I need exactly 3.5.

body: @Carmezim Thank you. I was trying with the various PHP environments on my windows machine, which has php 2.7 and 3.6. Since it was not working with 3.6, out of desperation, I tried with 2.7 and copied that message and not the one with 3.6 (which produces the same error message). I notice now that I need exactly 3.5.
